title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7856.2 - Filing requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7856.2 - Filing requirements

State Regulations

Major energy suppliers or industry groups, trade
associations or combinations of such groups and associations shall file in
electronic form the specified information as requested by the board, or by the
chair as authorized by the board, in a format that the chair deems appropriate
on the schedule set by the chair. The board shall seek to obtain relevant
information under this Subchapter C of this Chapter from entities that are
members of the board, including the bulk system operator, before requiring
filings from major energy suppliers or industry groups, trade associations or
combinations of such groups and associations. To the extent possible, the board
will rely on publicly available data in developing the plan. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7856.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
